meaningMnemonic: You know that 笑う is "to laugh." This is a noun version of that, though it's not "a laugh," (that's 笑い). Add お to that and you have the thing that makes you laugh. It's <vocabulary>comedy</vocabulary>. It's the <vocabulary>joke</vocabulary> that's elevated with お because it made you laugh SOOOOO much. Haha!
readingMnemonic: The reading is the same 笑う or 笑い. It's also the same as what you learned with the kanji.
